data.caption: Outcome Of Board Of Directors Meeting Held On Thursday February 05 2026
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Thursday February 05 2026 has inter alia considered and approved/declared 1st Interim Dividend @ 5% on face value i.e. Rs 0.50 /- per equity share of Face Value of Rs. 10/- each on 908564850 equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2025-26 and has fixed Friday February 13 2026 as Record Date for the purpose of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2025-26.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Of Directors Meeting Held On Thursday February 05 2026
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Thursday February 05 2026 has inter alia considered and approved the un-audited standalone and consolidated Financial Results of the Company along with Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors thereon for the third quarter and nine months ended on December 31 2025 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company and Approved/declared 1st Interim Dividend @ 5% on face value i.e. Rs 0.50 /- per equity share of Face Value of Rs. 10/- each on 908564850 equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2025-26 and has fixed Friday February 13 2026 as Record Date for the purpose of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2025-26.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Of Directors Meeting Held On Thursday February 05 2026
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Thursday February 05 2026 has inter alia considered and approved the un-audited standalone and consolidated Financial Results of the Company along with Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors thereon for the third quarter and nine months ended on December 31 2025 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company and Approved/declared 1st Interim Dividend @ 5% on face value i.e. Rs 0.50 /- per equity share of Face Value of Rs. 10/- each on 908564850 equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2025-26 and has fixed Friday February 13 2026 as Record Date for the purpose of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2025-26.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Of Directors Meeting Held On Thursday February 05 2026
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e. Thursday February 05 2026 has inter alia considered and approved un-audited standalone and consolidated Financial Results of the Company along with Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors thereon for the third quarter and nine months ended on December 31 2025 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company and Approved/declared 1st Interim Dividend @ 5% on face value i.e. Rs 0.50 /- per equity share of Face Value of Rs. 10/- each on 908564850 equity shares of the Company for the financial year 2025-26 and has fixed Friday February 13 2026 as Record Date for the purpose of Interim Dividend for the Financial Year 2025-26.

data.news_body: The Company has informed about the proceedings of 9th Annual General Meeting of the Company.

data.caption: Intimation Of Change In Record Date For The Purpose Of Final Dividend For The Financial Year 2024-25
data.news_body:
This is in furtherance to our earlier announcement dated August 20 2025 wherein we had informed the Exchanges that the Company has fixed Monday September 08 2025 as the Record Date for determining the Members eligible to receive final dividend for the financial year 2024-25 pursuant to Regulation 42 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
The Company has been advised by the NSE and BSE vide their email dated September 04 2025 and September 05 2025 respectively to revise the Record Date to Tuesday September 09 2025 due to declaration of September 08 2025 as a Clearing/Settlement Holiday by Reserve Bank of India vide press release 2025-2026/1042 dated September 04 2025.

Accordingly the Record date earlier fixed as September 08 2025 stands revised to September 09 2025.

data.news_body: In compliance with Regulations 30 and 33 of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (LODR) Regulations 2015 (including any statutory modification(s) amendment(s) or re-enactment(s) thereof for the time being in force) this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e Monday February 10 2025 has inter alia considered and approved the Un-audited standalone and consolidated Financial Results of the Company along with Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors thereon for the Third Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31 2024 as recommended by the Audit Committee of the Company. data.caption: Clarification On News Item Appearing In Media/Publication
data.news_body: This is with the reference of mail dated 23 September 2024 with regard to Clarification on news item appearing in Media/ Publication please find our reply on the same.

data.caption: Clarification sought from BLS E-Services Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from BLS E-Services Ltd with reference to the media report on https://www.thehindu.com dated September 19, 2024 (Link: https://www.thehindu.com/business/bls-e-services-ties-up-with-sbi-general-insurance-to-offer-insurance-products/article68660921.ece) titled BLS E-Services ties up with SBI General Insurance to offer insurance products.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizer''s Report
data.news_body: In Continuation of our earlier Corporate announcement dated September 10, 2024 for outcome of 8th AGM of the company , please find enclosed following documents :1. Voting result2. consolidated Report of Scrutinizer''s on Voting

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: The 8th (1st Post IPO) AGM of BLS e-Services Limited  was conducted on Tuesday September, 10, 2024 through electronic means and other Audio Visual Means facility to transact the business as stated in the AGM notice dated August, 05, 2024. The AGM was commenced at 3:00 PM(IST) and concluded at 3:40 PM (including time allowed for E voting at AGM)

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Public Notice  for completion of dispatch of Notice of 8th (1st Post IPO) Annual General Meeting of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: News Papers Advertisement for attention of Equity Shareholders of the Company in respect of information regarding the 8th Annual General Meeting of the Company.

data.caption: Submission Of Monitoring Agency Report
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 32(6) of SEBI (LODR ) Regulations, 2015 , we are submitting herewith the quarterly report of Monitoring Agency w.r.t. utilization of proceeds from Initial Public Offer of the Company.

data.news_body: News Paper Publication of unaudited quarterly financial results of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2024

data.caption: Outcome Of Nomination And Remuneration Committee Dated August 05, 2024
data.news_body: The Nomination and Remuneration Committee of the Company in its meeting held on August 05, 2024 has approved the Following matters;1. Reconstitution of the BLS E-Services Employees Welfare Trust2. Grant of 6,26,000 stock options to certain identified eligible employees of the Company, its Subsidiaries and its holding Company

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter Ended 30/06/2024
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) 2015 we are submitting herewith the Financial Results of the Company For the quarter ended June 30, 2024

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulation, 2015, Investor presentation with respect to Audited Financial Performance of BLS E-Services Limited for the Fourth quarter and year ended March 31, 2024 is enclosed.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Of Directors Meeting  For Audited Financial Result
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30 & 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulation 2015, the Board of Director at their meeting held today  has considered and approved standalone and consolidated audited financial result for the fourth quarter and financial year ended March 31, 2024.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Of Directors Meeting Held On Monday, May 13, 2024
data.news_body:
In compliance with Regulations 30 and 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 , this is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their meeting held today i.e Monday, May 13, 2024, has, inter alia, considered and approved the following items of agenda:

1. Standalone and Consolidated Audited Financial Results for the Fourth Quarter and Financial Year ended March 31, 2024along with Auditors' Report thereon.

2. Re-appointment of M/s. P. K. Mishra & Associates., PCS as Secretarial Auditors of the Company.
3. Re-appointment of Nangia & Company, LLP as Internal Auditors of the Company
4. Mr. Sameer Kumar, appointed as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company with effect from May 13, 2024.
5. Pursuant to Regulation 30 (5) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 the contact details of the KMP
